channel.title: How do i change shop prices?
channel.description: how do i change to shop prices? thankfull for help :D

item.title: How do i change shop prices?
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

go to item.java, search for the item id u wanna change, like if u want to change whip price go to item.java press ctrl + f search for 4151 and then u will see something like this

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	       1550000	     1550000	       1550000	        0	         82

then u will have to change the “1550000” to the price ur want, only change the first 3! those are low alch high alch and the price it self, so in my case whip is 1,5m at shops, if u wanna change it to 500k, type 500000 instead of 1550000

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change shop prices?

item.title: How do i change shop prices?
item.dc:creator: @duffy12345678910 duffy12345678910
item.description:
@duffy12345678910 wrote:

[quote=“baspwnzz, post:2, topic:307296”]Open shops.cfg

then u see the name of the shop and then u have the item id price item id price and change the second one the first 2 numbers isnt in the shop;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2009, 12:36:19 pm[/size][hr]and if u need help trough teamviewer add me on msn basbillebloot@hotmail.com[/quote]
for me its only the item and the amount of the item in the shop
